00029 // C memory allocation routines: macros in common compilations
00030 //=============================================================================
00031 
00032 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00033 
00034 #include <stdlib.h>
00035 
00047 #ifdef COMPILE_MEMORY_PROFILE
00048 
00049         #if defined(COMPILE_ON_WINDOWS) || defined(COMPILE_ON_MINGW)
00050                 #error "This stuff should be never compiled on Windows"
00051         #endif
00052 
00059         extern void * kvi_malloc(int size);
00060 
00068         extern void * kvi_realloc(void * ptr,int size);
00069 
00076         extern void   kvi_free(void * ptr);
00077 
00078 #else
00079 
00080         #ifndef COMPILE_MEMORY_CHECKS
00081 
00082                 // These two are the "common" ones
00083                 #define kvi_malloc(__size_) malloc(__size_)
00084                 #define kvi_realloc(__ptr_,__size_) realloc((void *)__ptr_,__size_)
00085 
00086         #else
00087 
00088                 #ifdef COMPILE_ON_WINDOWS
00089                         #error "This stuff should be never compiled on Windows"
00090                 #endif
00091 
00092                 // Want to check all the pointers
00093                 #define kvi_malloc(__size_) kvi_safe_malloc(__size_)
00094                 #define kvi_realloc(__ptr_,__size_) kvi_safe_realloc((void *)__ptr_,__size_)
00095 
00096                 #ifndef _KVI_MALLOC_CPP_
00097 
00100                         extern void outOfMemory();
00101                 #endif
00102 
00109                 inline void * kvi_safe_malloc(int size)
00110                 {
00111                         void * ptr = malloc(size);
00112                         if(!ptr)outOfMemory();
00113                         return ptr;
00114                 }
00115 
00123                 inline void * kvi_safe_realloc(void * ptr,int size)
00124                 {
00125                         ptr = realloc(ptr,size);
00126                         if(!ptr)outOfMemory();
00127                         return ptr;
00128                 }
00129 
00130         #endif //COMPILE_MEMORY_CHECKS
00131 
00132         #define kvi_free(__ptr_) free((void *)__ptr_)
00133 
00134 #endif
00135 
00136 #endif //_KVI_MALLOC_H_
